dict.string:
{"response_time":1496300685.7891,"data":[{"user_avatar":"http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/userfiles/000/000/002/74947!Head.jpg","relationship":0,"user_name":"Blued小布","feed_dig":3465,"comments":[{"anchor":0,"comment_timestamp":1495883437,"note":"","comment_uid":"582949","feed_id":"95739090","live":0,"user_name":"我心自由飞翔","user_avatar":"http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/userfiles/000/582/949/83581!Head.jpg","comment_id":128000667,"is_new":0,"is_reply":0,"comment_allow_delete":0,"comment_content":"北京大学中文系教授张颐武说：“其实端午和清明不太一样。虽然纪念屈原，但也有祛病祝吉祥，让大家快乐的意义。”他引用歌谣“五月五，是端阳，门插艾，香满堂；吃粽子，洒白糖，龙舟下水喜洋洋”驳斥道，这有什么不能快乐的。乐观和开朗，也是这个节日的应有之义，无须太拘泥。此外，他还引用晏殊的《端午诗》、唐玄宗《端午三殿宴群臣》诗的序，来印证“许多古人诗文都讲到欢喜快乐过端午”。"},{"anchor":0,"comment_timestamp":1495880495,"note":"","comment_uid":"16273272","feed_id":"95739090","live":0,"user_name":"XINZHIXUN","user_avatar":"http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/userfiles/016/273/272/65367!Head.jpg","comment_id":127996875,"is_new":0,"is_reply":0,"comment_allow_delete":0,"comment_content":"切记：不要祝他人端午节快乐。端午节和清明节都是祭奠日。 普及点知识： 端午节不能互祝快乐的，最多互祝＂端午安康＂因为端午节是个祭祀节日，这天伍子胥投钱塘江，曹娥救父投曹娥江，大文豪屈原投汨罗水。 五月初五是毒日，是个悲壮的日子，是祭祀日子。 要扫扫盲了，不是所有节日都给互祝快乐，如淸明节、端午节！只能互送＂安康！＂???"}],"is_ads":0,"feed_videos_width":[],"feed_pics_width":[690],"is_new":0,"feed_videos":[],"feed_pics":["http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/ingfiles/000/000/002/2_75873_1495879466.png"],"is_videos":0,"is_repost":0,"live":0,"blued_pic":"http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/badge/source_3/74107_1472557665.png","distance":1.39,"feed_uid":"2","liked":[],"feed_pics_height":[520],"feed_id":"95739090","anchor":1,"is_url":0,"feed_videos_height":[],"feed_comment":263,"feed_content":"“万水千山粽是情，每逢佳节倍思亲”，端午佳节又到了，小伙伴们有没有思念亲人，思念家乡的粽子呢？小布在这里祝愿大家端午节快乐，也希望各位小伙伴有时间能回家休息，陪伴亲人左右，在这个节日参与话题#端午节吃粽子#，一起晒出你家乡的粽子，分享节日的祝福吧！","repost_count":72,"vbadge":3,"iliked":0,"repost_ttid":"0","feed_extras":{},"allow_comments":0,"note":"","feed_timestamp":"1495879467"},{"user_avatar":"http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/userfiles/000/000/002/74947!Head.jpg","relationship":0,"user_name":"Blued小布","feed_dig":2720,"comments":[{"anchor":0,"comment_timestamp":1495794360,"note":"","comment_uid":"6720761","feed_id":"95626442","live":0,"user_name":"_栀璃鸢年","user_avatar":"http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/userfiles/006/720/761/5735!Head.jpg","comment_id":127899800,"is_new":0,"is_reply":0,"comment_allow_delete":0,"comment_content":"希望可以自动取消推荐的人。因为我真的对他们不感兴趣。同意的点赞?"},{"anchor":0,"comment_timestamp":1495792174,"note":"","comment_uid":"3057397","feed_id":"95626442","live":0,"user_name":"M张R","user_avatar":"http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/userfiles/003/057/397/64941!Head.jpg","comment_id":127897183,"is_new":0,"is_reply":0,"comment_allow_delete":0,"comment_content":"不要天天给我推荐你感兴趣的人了，烦不烦？！"}],"is_ads":0,"feed_videos_width":[],"feed_pics_width":[690,690,690,690],"is_new":0,"feed_videos":[],"feed_pics":["http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/ingfiles/000/000/002/2_88490_1495786568.png","http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/ingfiles/000/000/002/2_25307_1495786571.png","http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/ingfiles/000/000/002/2_46628_1495786573.png","http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/ingfiles/000/000/002/2_79857_1495786578.png"],"is_videos":0,"is_repost":0,"live":0,"blued_pic":"http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/badge/source_3/74107_1472557665.png","distance":0.01,"feed_uid":"2","liked":[],"feed_pics_height":[520,520,520,520],"feed_id":"95626442","anchor":1,"is_url":0,"feed_videos_height":[],"feed_comment":368,"feed_content":"亲爱的小伙伴，Blued更新啦！
-新版本在身边增加了“立刻”玩法，独行侠们可以选择你想做的事，即刻勾搭好基友！
-动态新增定位功能哟！，标记你的每个动态位置。
-@ 提醒功能上线，发动态和评论@ 你想提醒的人，对方不会再错过你的消息了哦~
-彩虹浪骄傲上线，准备迎接火热的夏天。
PS：大家来玩个小挑战，下拉身边界面并迅速截图，你能刷出完整的彩虹浪吗？刷出来的小伙伴可以截图@Blued小布 哦！","repost_count":19,"vbadge":3,"iliked":0,"repost_ttid":"0","feed_extras":{},"allow_comments":0,"note":"","feed_timestamp":"1495786581"},{"user_avatar":"http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/userfiles/000/000/002/74947!Head.jpg","relationship":0,"user_name":"Blued小布","feed_dig":6739,"comments":[{"anchor":1,"comment_timestamp":1494830828,"note":"","comment_uid":"7764027","feed_id":"94420335","live":0,"user_name":"An-安晓渔","user_avatar":"http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/userfiles/007/764/027/48290!Head.jpg","comment_id":126803003,"is_new":0,"is_reply":0,"comment_allow_delete":0,"comment_content":"我就差一个了，大家能帮帮忙吗？帮我赞一下"},{"anchor":1,"comment_timestamp":1494832404,"note":"","comment_uid":"9466198","feed_id":"94420335","live":0,"user_name":"杨小贱YXJ","user_avatar":"http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/userfiles/009/466/198/31031!Head.jpg","comment_id":126805335,"is_new":0,"is_reply":0,"comment_allow_delete":0,"comment_content":"我就差一个，帅哥们帮我点个赞，么么哒[爱你]"}],"is_ads":0,"feed_videos_width":[],"feed_pics_width":[290,690,290,290,690,290,290,290,290],"is_new":0,"feed_videos":[],"feed_pics":["http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/ingfiles/000/000/002/2_16696_1494827988.png","http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/ingfiles/000/000/002/2_62442_1494827995.png","http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/ingfiles/000/000/002/2_20321_1494828010.png","http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/ingfiles/000/000/002/2_2322_1494828014.png","http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/ingfiles/000/000/002/2_73056_1494828021.png","http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/ingfiles/000/000/002/2_17227_1494828032.png","http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/ingfiles/000/000/002/2_28894_1494828035.png","http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/ingfiles/000/000/002/2_5951_1494828037.png","http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/ingfiles/000/000/002/2_37888_1494828040.png"],"is_videos":0,"is_repost":0,"live":0,"blued_pic":"http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/badge/source_3/74107_1472557665.png","distance":2.96,"feed_uid":"2","liked":[],"feed_pics_height":[250,520,250,250,520,250,250,250,250],"feed_id":"94420335","anchor":1,"is_url":0,"feed_videos_height":[],"feed_comment":1489,"feed_content":"亲爱的小伙伴，彩虹勋章马上就要上线了！进入个人信息主页就能看到已经获取的勋章信息，“常来常往”、“出口成章”、“面面俱到”还有更多勋章可以获取哦！集齐6枚单色勋章还能获得Blued特别定制的专属彩虹勋章，详细信息请戳：https://app.blued.cn/term/medal 。","repost_count":184,"vbadge":3,"iliked":0,"repost_ttid":"0","feed_extras":{},"allow_comments":0,"note":"","feed_timestamp":"1494828044"},{"user_avatar":"http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/userfiles/000/000/002/74947!Head.jpg","relationship":0,"user_name":"Blued小布","feed_dig":5158,"comments":[{"anchor":0,"comment_timestamp":1493436915,"note":"","comment_uid":"11944095","feed_id":"92504656","live":0,"user_name":"Tencent丶御枫","user_avatar":"http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/userfiles/011/944/095/59815!Head.jpg","comment_id":125101443,"is_new":0,"is_reply":0,"comment_allow_delete":0,"comment_content":"妈的，这辈子最大的梦想就是去北京把小布睡了[鄙视]"},{"anchor":1,"comment_timestamp":1493651827,"note":"","comment_uid":"4627153","feed_id":"92504656","live":0,"user_name":"_小椴i","user_avatar":"http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/userfiles/004/627/153/27428!Head.jpg","comment_id":125397006,"is_new":0,"is_reply":0,"comment_allow_delete":0,"comment_content":"想睡小布的点赞[可爱]"}],"is_ads":0,"feed_videos_width":[],"feed_pics_width":[690],"is_new":0,"feed_videos":[],"feed_pics":["http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/ingfiles/000/000/002/2_21731_1493375245.png"],"is_videos":0,"is_repost":0,"live":0,"blued_pic":"http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/badge/source_3/74107_1472557665.png","distance":0.01,"feed_uid":"2","liked":[],"feed_pics_height":[520],"feed_id":"92504656","anchor":1,"is_url":0,"feed_videos_height":[],"feed_comment":548,"feed_content":"五一小长假如期而至，你是选择去看景区的人山人海，还是在家葛优瘫呢？假期不死宅，生活才有未来啊！我们为出行的你和“留守”的你都备好了新鲜有趣的内容： 期待来一场#五一我们偶遇吧！#，发出#旅行晒照#参加基友假期摄影大赛，但一定要记得#爆照才有男朋友#。
不出远门的你也不能辜负了这大好春光，我们已为你呼朋引伴，快找到你的组织，去“浪”一下，去发现身边的丰富美食吧！传送门：http://t.cn/RXUz3LA http://t.cn/RXzz1v4
葛优瘫的你看到别人成双成对的爆照你对“恩爱该不该秀”是不是也有自己的想法？更多犀利观点能让你来一场无声的“辩论”。快戳：https://app.blued.cn/standpoint?id=gabQ25","repost_count":25,"vbadge":3,"iliked":0,"repost_ttid":"0","feed_extras":{},"allow_comments":0,"note":"","feed_timestamp":"1493375250"},{"user_avatar":"http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/userfiles/000/000/002/74947!Head.jpg","relationship":0,"user_name":"Blued小布","feed_dig":3245,"comments":[{"anchor":0,"comment_timestamp":1492399999,"note":"","comment_uid":"2489605","reply_uid":15601251,"feed_id":"91130613","live":0,"user_name":"如果你爱狗","user_avatar":"http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/userfiles/002/489/605/95555!Head.jpg","reply_name":"车大炮丶","comment_id":123820590,"is_new":0,"is_reply":1,"reply_avatar":"http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/userfiles/015/601/251/87495!Head.jpg","comment_allow_delete":0,"comment_content":"同感，以前觉得这个软件是用来让同志玩的，现在觉得这个软件是用来玩同志的，各种直男上来连骗带哄，耿乐也是大力支持，比谁哄的钱多，初衷已经变了"},{"anchor":0,"comment_timestamp":1492396801,"note":"","comment_uid":"15601251","feed_id":"91130613","live":0,"user_name":"车大炮丶","user_avatar":"http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/userfiles/015/601/251/87495!Head.jpg","comment_id":123815793,"is_new":0,"is_reply":0,"comment_allow_delete":0,"comment_content":"不知道是不是人民的名义看多了，感觉这个软件彻底的被金钱腐败了，当年的初衷不见了。"}],"is_ads":0,"feed_videos_width":[],"feed_pics_width":[690],"is_new":0,"feed_videos":[],"feed_pics":["http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/ingfiles/000/000/002/2_86346_1492395872.png"],"is_videos":0,"is_repost":0,"live":0,"blued_pic":"http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/badge/source_3/74107_1472557665.png","distance":0.01,"feed_uid":"2","liked":[],"feed_pics_height":[520],"feed_id":"91130613","anchor":1,"is_url":0,"feed_videos_height":[],"feed_comment":655,"feed_content":"【第二波彩虹勋章上线了】现在开始，只要参与5个观点投票并评论、个人动态累计5条以上图文并茂动态（每条动态点赞达到10个、评论达到5条） 就会获得相对应等级的“彩虹勋章”。该勋章将会在个人资料页展示，每一枚彩虹勋章都是大家与Blued积极互动的表彰，每获得一枚彩虹勋章，都寓意着你们在小布心中有多么重要~此外，勋章还将成为各位好基友相互认识和了解的小窗哦！详情请戳：http://dwz.cn/5MHmAj","repost_count":27,"vbadge":3,"iliked":0,"repost_ttid":"0","feed_extras":{},"allow_comments":0,"note":"","feed_timestamp":"1492395914"},{"user_avatar":"http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/userfiles/000/000/002/74947!Head.jpg","relationship":0,"user_name":"Blued小布","feed_dig":3628,"comments":[{"anchor":1,"comment_timestamp":1492155235,"note":"","comment_uid":"6313678","feed_id":"90819315","live":0,"user_name":"带上耳机聆听世界","user_avatar":"http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/userfiles/006/313/678/81638!Head.jpg","comment_id":123498903,"is_new":0,"is_reply":0,"comment_allow_delete":0,"comment_content":"抗议要求恢复到旧版本，支持的请点赞"},{"anchor":0,"comment_timestamp":1492153800,"note":"","comment_uid":"199643","feed_id":"90819315","live":0,"user_name":"安安酱-","user_avatar":"http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/userfiles/000/199/643/54129!Head.jpg","comment_id":123497147,"is_new":0,"is_reply":0,"comment_allow_delete":0,"comment_content":"我也觉得这次版本更新太不好用了，广场里面的动态都是些什么鬼？都是远隔一方的有什么意思？要求把附近动态还给我们，这是要我们卸载的节奏"}],"is_ads":0,"feed_videos_width":[],"feed_pics_width":[750,750,750],"is_new":0,"feed_videos":[],"feed_pics":["http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/ingfiles/000/000/002/2_84211_1492152777.png","http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/ingfiles/000/000/002/2_73994_1492152777.png","http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/ingfiles/000/000/002/2_4202_1492152778.png"],"is_videos":0,"is_repost":0,"live":0,"blued_pic":"http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/badge/source_3/74107_1472557665.png","distance":0.01,"feed_uid":"2","liked":[],"feed_pics_height":[866,866,872],"feed_id":"90819315","anchor":1,"is_url":0,"feed_videos_height":[],"feed_comment":1305,"feed_content":"亲爱的小伙伴们，blued已经更新新版本啦！现在新版本发现页的精选栏目每天都会呈现大家的优质动态，点开你喜欢的动态就能进行点赞、评论和转发。另外观点和话题在发现栏目顶部，点击就能进入参与！附近动态现已改名为广场了，并没有离开大家哦！对于新版本的建议和意见大家可以在评论中留言给小布！总之，新版本的趣味多多！快来一探究竟吧！","repost_count":21,"vbadge":3,"iliked":0,"repost_ttid":"0","feed_extras":{},"allow_comments":0,"note":"","feed_timestamp":"1492152780"},{"user_avatar":"http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/userfiles/000/000/002/74947!Head.jpg","relationship":0,"user_name":"Blued小布","feed_dig":4390,"comments":[{"anchor":1,"comment_timestamp":1490347702,"note":"","comment_uid":"15261814","feed_id":"88423190","live":0,"user_name":"态度丶","user_avatar":"http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/userfiles/015/261/814/130!Head.jpg","comment_id":120930961,"is_new":0,"is_reply":0,"comment_allow_delete":0,"comment_content":"很想知道小布长什么样子，有想知道的吗？点个赞？[哈哈]"},{"anchor":0,"comment_timestamp":1490335310,"note":"","comment_uid":"14946841","feed_id":"88423190","live":0,"user_name":"彩虹心理咨询","user_avatar":"http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/userfiles/014/946/841/8638!Head.jpg","comment_id":120912152,"is_new":0,"is_reply":0,"comment_allow_delete":0,"comment_content":"小布从来不发自拍，照样上热门！"}],"is_ads":0,"feed_videos_width":[],"feed_pics_width":[690],"is_new":0,"feed_videos":[],"feed_pics":["http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/ingfiles/000/000/002/2_18984_1490334158.png"],"is_videos":0,"is_repost":0,"live":0,"blued_pic":"http://77g4l9.com5.z0.glb.qiniucdn.com/badge/source_3/74107_1472557665.png","distance":0.01,"feed_uid":"2","liked":[],"feed_pics_height":[520],"feed_id":"88423190","anchor":1,"is_url":0,"feed_videos_height":[],"feed_comment":478,"feed_content":"亲爱的用户，今天小布就来教大家上热门的小技巧，首先动态要有配图，一定要有美美的自拍照！敲黑板！这个可是重点！其次，动态内最好带上话题！比如#睡照大比拼# #上班你都怎么穿# #今日自拍打卡#小布可是会经常逛话题的，说不定你就会被翻牌子了！
ps:如果你是认证过的用户，就更有几率获得小编青睐。
